questions.question_text: Which product was first provided commercially by Cisco?

discussion.content:
B
Cisco thus became the first company to provide a commercial multi-protocol router when it shipped its first product in 1986, a router for the TCP/IP (Transmission Control Protocol/Internet Protocol) protocol suite.

questions.question_text: Which Cisco endpoint is ideal for occasional-use, specialty settings such as cafeterias?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is the correct answer
answer is B. Key word is "occasioal use"
My Answer is "Cisco Unified SIP Phone 3900 Series", refer: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/collaboration-endpoints/unified-sip-phone-3900-series/index.html

Selected Answer: B
The answer is 6900 Series
The affordable Cisco Unified IP Phone 6900 Series delivers cost-effective VoIP communication services. The 6900 Series is ideal for occasional-use, specialty settings such as:

Lobbies
Cafeterias
Hallways
Elevators
Conference centers
Hotel and motel guestrooms
Tricky question - I say 6900 because "SIP" 3900 isn't a product line
but for Cafeterias is B

C
https://www.cisco.com/c/dam/en/us/products/collateral/collaboration-endpoints/unified-ip-phone-7940g/prod_brochure0900aecd800f6d4a.pdf
The answer is 6900 Series
Both 6900 and 3900 can be used for cafeterias, but i vote 3900 since its more than enough if i had cafeterias.

For Specialty-Use Settings
Cisco Unified IP Phone 6901
The single-line Cisco Unified IP Phone 6901 (Figure 2) is an entry-level endpoint that is ideal for
occasional-use, specialty settings such as:
• Lobbies
• Cafeterias
• Hallways
• Elevators
• Conference centers
• Hotel and motel guestrooms
https://www.cisco.com/c/dam/en/us/products/collateral/collaboration-endpoints/unified-ip-phone-7940g/prod_brochure0900aecd800f6d4a.pdf

questions.question_text: What key aspect of digitization allows the deployment of new services without lengthy and costly investments in server or networking infrastructure?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is the correct answer
answer B --> https://www.cisco.com/c/dam/global/ru_kz/solutions/enterprise-networks/digital-network-architecture/pdf/white-paper-c11-736842.pdf

Selected Answer: B
correct answer is B, Cloud computing
The answer is B
correct answer is B, Cloud compiting
Correct answer is B) Cloud computing allows the deployment of such new services without lengthy and costly investments in server or networking infrastructure.
The correct Answer is B - Cloud Computing allows the deployment of new services without lengthy and costly investments in server or networking infrastructure.

questions.question_text: Which phrase best describes Unified Communications?

discussion.content:
looks like B
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/products/unified-communications/index.html#~solutions

choices.B: integrated voice, video, mobility, and presence services across endpoints, devices and applications
choices.C: voice and video collaboration services accessed from a unified endpoint
choices.A: video conferencing accessible across endpoints, devices, and applications within an organization
choices.D: mobile endpoint applications that unify voice, video, and presence services to streamline communications and enhance productivity and collaboration

questions.question_text: Which of the following are included in Cisco's portfolio of converged infrastructure solutions?

discussion.content: A : https://www.cisco.com/c/en_in/solutions/data-center-virtualization/converged-infrastructure/index.html#~solutions

Converged infrastructure solutions
FlexPod
FlashStack
Hitachi adaptive solutions
VersaStack
VxBlock
Answer is C: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/solutions/data-center-virtualization/converged-infrastructure/index.html#~solutions

Selected Answer: A
The answer is A.

Selling Cisco’s DC and Cloud Architecture > Converged Infrastructure > Cisco's Converged Infrastructure Solutions

The answer is C, ref:
 https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/solutions/data-center-virtualization/converged-infrastructure/index.html#~solutions

Those that are currently included are from C
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/solutions/data-center-virtualization/converged-infrastructure/index.html#~solutions
C https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/solutions/data-center-virtualization/converged-infrastructure/index.html#~solutions

actually none of the answer is correct for nowadays, HyperFlex already separated from Converged Infra to Hyperconverged Infra .. Convered infra only consist of: FlexPod, FlashStack, Hitachi Adaptive, VxBlock and VersaStack.

https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/solutions/data-center-virtualization/converged-infrastructure/index.html#~solutions
a: Hyperflex, FlexPod, FlashStack, and VxBlock

Correct answer is A: Hyperflex, FlexPod, FlashStack and VxBlock
See "Selling Cisco’s DC and Cloud Architecture > Converged Infrastructure > Summary" : 
"Converged infrastructure solutions include Hyperflex, Flexpod, VxBlock systems, VersaStack, and FlashStack."
C. Hyperflex is hyperconvergence, and convergence is allowed by 3rd party storage vendors

None of those arec correct. The right answer is:
" FlashStack - VersaStack - HyperFlex - VxBlock "
